newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia Apex Equity loan stock upgraded.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia Apex Equity loan stock upgraded.

text.p: Rating Agency Malaysia (RAM) said on Tuesday it has upgraded the Guaranteed Redeemable Loan Stock of stockbroker Apex Equity Holdings Bhd.
Apex's 28.3 million ringgit worth of loan stock was given a long-term BBB1 rating, up from its previous BBB3 rating, the rating group said in a statement.

RAM said the upgrade reflected the "stockbroking division's stable market position, improvements in market and operating risks, strong overall support by the shareholders and healthy financial results".
The BBB rating denotes "moderate safety of timely payment of interest in principle; lacking in certain protective elements," a spokeswoman for RAM said.
The good future prospects of Apex were mitigated, however, by the industry's "inherent volatility, strict regulation and strong competition", RAM said.
